patterns: What can you do for me?
responses: I can have a small talk, help to take order and answer some questions regarding the beverages!

patterns: Can I have a decaf coffee?
responses: Decaf is short for decaffeinated coffee, it has at least 97% of caffeine removed. Unfortunately, we do not sell decaf coffee, sorry for any inconvenience.

patterns: Can I know what is Americano
responses: Americano also called as black coffee. It is simply just hot water and espresso. It will be served half espresso to half water.

Can I know what is Cappuccino
responses: A cappuccino is the perfect balance of espresso, steamed milk and foam.

patterns: Can I know what is Latte
responses: A true latte will be made up of one or two shots of espresso, lots of steamed milk and a final, thin layer of frothed milk on top.

patterns: Can I know what is Espresso
responses: Espresso is a delicious concentrated form of coffee, served in shots and it is often the coffee base of many other beverages, such as cappuccino, latte, and americano.

patterns: Can I know what is Mocha
responses: Mocha is a shot of espresso is combined with a chocolate powder or syrup, followed by milk or cream.

patterns: Can I know what is macchiato
responses: The macchiato is an espresso coffee drink, topped with a small amount of foamed or steamed milk to allow the taste of the espresso to still shine through.

patterns: Can I know what is Flat White
responses: A flat white is a blend of micro-foamed milk poured over a single or double shot of espresso.

patterns: Can I know what is Black Tea
responses: Black Tea also known as Red Tea is a type of tea that is more oxidized than oolong, yellow, white and green teas. It has stronger in flavour compare to other teas.

What are different types of tea
responses: There are many different types of tea; some have a cooling, slightly bitter, and astringent flavour, while others have vastly different profiles that include sweet, nutty, floral, or grassy notes.

patterns: What are your suggestions to coffee
responses: It is highly depend on your taste of bitterness, sweetness and amount of milk. You can ask about the coffee or tea served in our menu to have an idea of their taste. However, the most popular coffee is cappuccino.
